//Sample board on entering 10 and 10 as parameters while executing the makeboard file 

10 10
30 20 10 30 30 30 10 30 30 20 
30 30 10 30 10 30 10 30 30 10 
10 20 30 30 10 30 10 20 30 20 
30 30 20 20 20 10 30 30 10 10 
20 30 20 30 10 30 20 30 30 10 
30 30 30 10 10 30 10 10 30 20 
20 10 20 10 20 20 20 10 20 10 
10 30 10 20 10 20 20 30 10 20 
20 20 30 20 20 10 10 20 20 10 
30 10 10 30 30 30 10 10 30 20
